name: Escape The Void (Maximo Samperio)
description:
Escape The Void is a 2D Platformer featuring shooting aliens up. 

It is a small project I created on my own for a programming subject as a part of my bachellor's degree in videogame  development. We were tasked with creating a 2D game that had multiple features, imbeded lighting, and different kinds of enemies.
